name: Fruit Adventures Line
description:
Join the Fruit Adventures Line in the luscious land and explore loads of juicy and fun levels. Experience this thrilling puzzle matching game and complete the missions and challenges set at the beginning of each level. Reach high scores by making special combinations and try to get 3 stars on every splashy level.

WHY choosing Fruit Adventures Line:
- Match 3 or more fruits to collect appetizing fruits and veggies
- Powerful boosters, amazing props and unique obstacles skyrocket your fun
